Reviews.Title: “Good value, except for cleanliness issues.”
Reviews.Author: Musicallyshruthi
Reviews.Content: 23 euros night 8 bedded dorm stones throw museums value issue disgusting blocked sink didnt sort till late morning complained previous evening dorm bit crowded essentially double bedded 8 bunk beds instead seedier amsterdam trams running central station 5 minutes

Reviews.Content: stayed amsterdam 2 days trip didnt start checked hostel wont mention names day online picked hostel night knowing expect glad picked previous reviews mention hotel hostel price location near park clean professional time stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hostel- practically a hotel”
Reviews.Author: stmandula
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights march 2012 impressed location cleanliness hostel especially showerbathroom facilities hostel stones throw van gogh duh 15ish minute walk center city whatever hostel pretty nice city street shopping street feels safe female friends comfortable walking night 6 person tad cramped beds comfortable pillow towel included rate major plus breakfast cost 5 euro worth value definitely stay time am amsterdam im ill coming

Reviews.Content: stayed feb 2012 disappointed hostel safe location amsterdam safe nursery school doorstep hotel clean friendly staff helpful particularly providing extra heater weather minus 10 feb arriving flight headed hotel hope leave luggage safe pleasant surprise able check 3 hours ready extra cost hotel close van gogh museum amsterdam sign restaurants bars shopping close particular love designer wear double hotel offers larger foreign students stopping looking weekend enjoy themselves stay defiantly

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”

Reviews.Content: experience hostel amazing 4 sets bunk beds comfortable beds cleaned day safes provided bed luggage available floor comfortable mates didnt bathroom shower shower pressure staff front desk helpful enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Van Gogh Hotel Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: annie_nn
Reviews.Content: hostel looks actually hotelit clean shared bedrooms safes look valuable everyday beds clean sheets towelswe didnt breakfast pay separately van gogh museum center city

Reviews.Title: “Classy Hostel”
Reviews.Author: Traveller07_10
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights january 2012 office billed nice experience smack middle museumplein central walking distance major sights city hotelhostel situated quiet pedestrian street facing primary school building children playing street daybut nice street runs chichi bond street type roads famous amsterdam leave wallets taking partner shopping single facing onto hotel quiet van gogh mural wall bed course clean furnished including brandnew shower bathroom fittings flatscreen tv lift access 4th floor etc wifi throughout hotel 5euro breakfasts communal lobby standard helpyourself foods facilities major hotel city difference guests trays items fun change fussy performance normal 45 hotels normally stay breakfasts cost 80euros hostel classy residents late atmosphere buzzy civilised frontdesk staff efficient overly friendly fine helpful transport tourist information eg telling 4euro busride airport vs 50euros taxi latter price paid night allinall gem stay amsterdam prepared friendly human stuffy tourist valentines date

Reviews.Title: “Great hostel, very modern and clean with easy access to centre”
Reviews.Author: theomerta
Reviews.Content: hostel clean throughout minutes walk nearest tram station straight centre atmosphere dining arealobby found night staff pretty useless 10 shared 8 bed dorm hostel initially staff helpful offered extra beds stay bit late getting arrived told staff night duty assumed coming luckily arguing fork additional 10 booking fee able check issue night staff tried drink vending machine kept eating money reported guy duty didnt care aside crappy nightstaff enjoyed stay en suite clean fresh bed linen towels recommend hostel try check day avoid night staff

Reviews.Title: “First hostel experience - Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Ross I
Reviews.Content: stayed week january 2012 19 booked private dorms finished standard modern size bed own safe ensuite shower clean modern â‚¬5 breakfast option value money basic careful arrive 11 breakfast queue towards food sharply hits 11am recommend hostel tram links outside convenient reach dam centre amsterdam corner bols factory couple hours free â‚¬10 student rate tour cocktail shots

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Emma M
Reviews.Content: stayed hostel van gogh september 2011 friends booked cheap flights minute found hostel â£80 3 nights werent expect hotel pictures hotel information pictures normally deceiving hostel modern bedrooms 8 person bunks private safes person free charge recommend hostel cheap getaway clean modern stay hostel city centre bought 3 day unlimited tram pass 15 tram stop ouside hostel definately try red light district pub crawl 5 star hostel 5 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Aquaii
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel spacious comfy beds bathroom clean maintained regularly cleaned staff friendly willing advice breakfast 5 euro eat loved continental rest preferred choice supermarket trambus stop left hotel proved useful bad lift broke staying fine staying ground floor rest 4th floor walk suspect lift broke piling sigh saying 3 people definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Very surprised - great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: GemM210
Reviews.Content: booked hostel six 2021 girls beginning december chose hostel relatively cheap price pictures looked nice arrived private six sharing ensuite obviously refurbished recently quality loved bathroom huge double shower staff reception couldnt helped willing offer directions advice booking tickets amsterdam pub crawl fun location hostel fine usin relatively quiet near street designer shops tram stop minutes walk hostel short ten minute ride main stops amsterdam central station dam square id definately reccomend hostelhotel visiting doesnt spend loads happily stay

Reviews.Title: “smell of pot whole night, kids screaming whole day!”
Reviews.Author: glhs
Reviews.Content: hotel policy nonsmoking public private dont reinforce night time smell cigarettes weed night people talking secret trips random people banging door 4 am fire 24hr reception random people 247 theres care opposite hotel kids screaming stop day bed comfy whats disgusting smell noise

Reviews.Title: “Ok stay”
Reviews.Author: goccmm
Reviews.Content: staff ok friendly wifi signal stable hotel managing system pretty pricy backpackers ave night superior 6 bed female dorm ensuite location outside van gogh museum couple bus choices outside hotel easy commute train station

Reviews.Title: “Not disappointed at all.”
Reviews.Author: sOaOnOdOeOe
Reviews.Content: ive read negative reviews especially management found okay clean beds comfortable decor bathrooms modern location front van gogh museum trams stop front hostel disappointment mingle travelers overall definitely recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at the Van Gogh Hostel”

Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay van gogh hostel hotel section ensuite bathroom toilet praise pleasant staff efficient prestay communication via email hostel newly renovated clean lovely bathroom etc person personal safe locking precious items breakfast cost 5 euros wide selection food including cold meats eggs bread croissants highly recommended looking hostel style accommodation amsterdam cant

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Lauralou1000
Reviews.Content: night stay hotel van gogh friends value money location museum quarter trams mins explore amsterdam foot staff friendly checked 2 hours check time gorgeous spacious twin flat screen tv comfy beds balcony doors impressed bathroom huge shower hairdryer toiletries towels provided spotlessly clean definitely stay reccommend

Reviews.Title: “I wish I had checked some reviews before booking this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Andy H
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel van gogh friends marathon weekend front hotelvery noisy hostel guests returned daynight heating nights sleep shivering listen inconsiderate idiots outside hostel hear hostel hotel offer double actually comfortable spacious tea coffee facilities drawers luggage clothing coat hangers double complaining heating am moved 3rd floor rear hotel quieter butthe heating hotel actually mixture single dorms lift covered grafitti didnt agree portrayed poor image hotel friend bought attention comfortable lounge dining resembled school canteen 1960s breakfast value money absolutely frills staff little helpful rude dismissive opinion â£160 night truly ripped nights superb service comparison travel lodges bbs advice look booking yourself hostel hotel definitely staying

Reviews.Title: “Small Hotel. Decent value for money.”
Reviews.Author: Maverick145
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel van gogh amsterdam 2 friends 3 nights recently hotel hostel hotel close van gogh museum 15 minutes bus dam square arrived pretty late night check greeted nice guy reception patiently explained answered queries booked 6 bed private ensuite decent considering money paid air conditioner window completely feel suffocated overall value money hotel lot youngsters staying

Reviews.Title: “Good stay”
Reviews.Author: wen_c82
Reviews.Content: hotel accident preference booked clean renovated hotel perfect location purpose visiting museums tram 2 5 van gogh museum stop walk couple minutes hotel fita arrived hostel vibe indeed hotel hostel hotel shared front desk dining facility quiet night sleep reserved twin hotel size amsterdam twin simply furnished 32 inch flat panel tv slightly bigger 2 beds lot luggage bathroom brand clean shower 4 stars hotel stayed check process bit slow receptionist wifi free throughout hotel 2 computers hotel charges 5 euro breakfast value amsterdam
